name: Mocana Corporation
description:
Mocana provides mission-critical IoT security solutions for embedded systems and the Internet of Things. 
Our IoT security software is used by hundreds of companies to secure millions of devices, controllers, and embedded systems. 
Our comprehensive device-to-cloud platform is integrated with more than 70 chipsets, 30 operating systems and real-time operating systems (RTOS) for wired and wireless networking environments.
